name: Darkvision
desc: You are able to see clearly up to 60ft in dim light, and in darkness up to 60ft as if it were dim light.

name: Celestial Resistance
desc: You have resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

name: Healing Touch
desc: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of HP equal to your level. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Light Bearer
desc: You know the cantrip Light. CHA is your spellcasting ability for it.

name: Radiant Soul (3rd LVL)
desc: As an action, you can unleash your divine power causing your eyes to glimmer and celestial wings to sprout from your back. Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30ft per round and once per turn you may deal extra radiant damage equal to your level when you damage a target with an attack or spell. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Powerful Build
desc: You count as one size larger when determining the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

name: Mountain Born
desc: You have resistance to cold damage.

name: Natural Athlete
desc: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

name: Stone’s Endurance
desc: You can focus yourself to shrug off an injury. When you take damage, you may roll a d12 and add your CON modifier to the number rolled, then reduce the damage by that number. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Fey Ancestry
desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed. In addition, magic can’t put you to sleep.

name: Versatile
desc: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

name: Elvish Knowledge
desc: ou know one cantrip of your choice from the Wizard list. INT is your spellcasting ability for it.

name: Menacing
desc: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

name: Relentless Endurance
desc: If your HP would be reduced to 0 but you are not killed outright, you may instead have it be reduced to 1. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Savage Attack
desc: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you may roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add that number to the damage of the critical hit.

name: Well Spoken
desc: You can speak, read and write one language of your choice.

name: Infernal Resistance
desc: You have resistance to fire damage.

name: Infernal Legacy
desc: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd LVL, you know the Infernal Rebuke spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Darkness spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Silver Tongue (3rd LVL)
desc: You know the Charm Person spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Charge
desc: You may charge straight at a target within 20ft and hit it with a melee weapon attack. If you do, you may roll your weapon’s damage twice and add those numbers together. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Hooves
desc: Your hooves are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with a hoof, your target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage + your STR modifier.

name: Equine Build
desc: You count as one size larger when determining the weight you can push, drag, or lift. In addition, a Medium or smaller sized creature may ride on your equine back if you allow it.

name: Survivor
desc: You have proficiency in the Survival skill.

name: Hybrid Nature
desc: You count as both a Humanoid and a Monstrosity, and can be affected by any effect if it works on either of your creature types.

name: Claws
desc: Your claws are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your claws, your target takes 1d6 slashing damage + your STR modifier.

name: Vulpine Grace
desc: You have proficiency in Acrobatics. In addition, you have advantage on saving throws to avoid falling prone.

name: Horns
desc: Your horns are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your horns, your target takes 1d6 piercing damage + your STR modifier.

name: Hammering Horns
desc: After making a successful melee attack, you may attempt to push the target back 1d6 ft with your horns. Your target must be no more than one size larger than you and must be within 5ft. Your target must make a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your STR modifier. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Feline Agility
desc: When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your movement speed until the end of your turn. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Feline Claws
desc: Your claws are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your claws, your target takes 1d6 slashing damage + your STR modifier. In addition, you have a climbing speed of 20ft per round.

name: Feline Senses
desc: You have proficiency in the Perception and Stealth skills.

name: Flight
desc: You have a flying speed of 50ft per round.

name: Talons
desc: Your talons are natural melee weapons with which you are proficient. If you hit with your talons, your target takes 1d6 slashing damage + your STR modifier.

name: Expert Forgery
desc: You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

name: Master of Trickery
desc: You have proficiency in the Deception and Sleight of Hand skills.

name: Mimicry
desc: You are able to mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Insight check opposed by your Deception check.

name: Who You Callin’ Small?
desc: When you damage a creature with an attack or spell who is at least one size larger than yours, you may have that attack deal extra damage to that creature equal to your LVL. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Nimble Escape
desc: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

name: Martial Training
desc: You have proficiency with light armor and with two martial weapons of your choice.

name: Saving Face
desc: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or saving throw, you may gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies who can see you within 30ft with a maximum of +5. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Mountain Born
desc: You have resistance to cold damage.

name: Display of Strength
desc: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill. In addition, you may use your STR modifier instead of your CHA modifier for Intimidation checks.

name: Scholarly
desc: You have proficiency in the Arcana and History skills.

name: Ancient Wellspring
desc: As an action, you are able to heal yourself to full health. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Grovel
desc: As an action, you may cower to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10ft that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Pack Tactics
desc: You have advantage on attack rolls as long as an ally is within 10ft of you.

name: Sunlight Sensitivity
desc: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in direct sunlight or bright light.

name: Draconic Ancestry
desc: You are distantly related to a particular kind of dragon. The type of dragon determines the damage and area of your breath weapon, and the type of resistance you gain.

name: Dragonbreath
desc: As an action, you may use your breath weapon to exhale destructive energy. All creatures in the area of effect must make a saving throw. The DC of this saving throw is 8 + your CON modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save. At 6th LVL, this damage increases to 3d6. At 11th LVL, this damage increases to 4d6. At 16th LVL, this damage increases to 5d6. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Tough Scales
desc: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your ancestry.

name: Deep Resilience
desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or paralyzed.

name: Deep Magic (3rd LVL)
desc: You know the Enlarge Self spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Invisibility spell. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Dwarven Resilience
desc: You have proficiency with smith’s tools.

name: Stoneskin
desc: You have proficiency in the History skill.

name: Survivalist
desc: You have proficiency with battleaxes and handaxes.

name: Trance
desc: Instead of sleeping, you meditate for up to 4 hours. This gives you the same benefit as a full rest.

name: Dark Magic
desc: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. At 3rd LVL, you know the Fey Fire spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Darkness spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this

name: Stone Camouflage
desc: You have advantage on Stealth checks when in caves or rocky terrain.

name: Gnome Cunning
desc: You have advantage on INT, WIS and CHA saving throws against magic

name: Firbolg Magic
desc: You know the Detect Magic and Disguise Self spells. WIS is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Hidden Step
desc: As a bonus action, you can magically turn invisible until your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Lucky
desc: If you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check or saving throw, you may reroll the die. If you do, you must use the new result, even if it is a 1.

name: Brave
desc: You have advantage on Intimidation saving throws against you.

name: Naturally Stealthy
desc: You have advantage on Stealth checks even when not obscured.

name: Keen Senses
desc: ou know one cantrip of your choice from the Wizard list. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Master Tinker
desc: You have proficiency with tinker’s tools.

name: Master of Magics
desc: You know two cantrips of your choice from the Wizard list. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Gnome Cunning
desc: You have advantage on INT, WIS and CHA saving throws against magic.

name: Natural Illusionist
desc: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. INT is your spellcasting modifier for this.

name: Speak with Small Beasts
desc: You are able to understand and communicate with Small or smaller beasts.

name: Gift of the Sea
desc: You know the Fog Cloud spell. At 3rd LVL, you know the Gust of Wind spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Wall of Water spell. CHA is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Aquatic Affinity
desc: You are able to understand and communicate with aquatic beasts. In addition, you have a swimming speed of 30ft per round.

name: Master Artisan
desc: You have proficiency with smith’s tools.

name: Craftsman’s Knowledge
desc: You have proficiency in the History skill.

name: AND MY AXE!
desc: You have proficiency with battleaxes and handaxes.

name: Mask of the Wild
desc: You gain advantage on Stealth checks when hiding in foliage, rain, snow, mist and other natural phenomena.

name: Ethereal Glow
desc: You generate dim light in a 10ft radius.

name: Ethereal Body (3rd LVL)
desc: You know the Invisibility spell. At 5th LVL, you know the Mist Step spell. At 7th LVL, you know the Nondetection spell. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Contemplative
desc: You have proficiency in the History and Persuasion skills.

name: Psionic Grip
desc: You have advantage when attempting to charm a creature.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
desc: As a bonus action, you may teleport up to 30ft away. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Alchemist’s Satchel
desc: You craft an alchemist’s satchel. This bag and its contents are magical, and contain the materials you need for your Concoction options. If you lose your satchel, you are able to construct a new one over the course of three days.

name: Concoction of Fire
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Fire and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The area of impact if filled with a 10ft radius of flames, and any target within it must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 1d6 fire damage.

name: Concoction of Acid
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Acid and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The target must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 1d6 acid damage.

name: Concoction of Healing
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Healing. A creature may drink the concoction to heal 3d8 HP. Once a creature has drunk the concoction, they can’t drink it again until after a rest.

name: Concoction of Noxious Fumes
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Noxious Fumes and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The area of impact if filled with a 10ft radius of poisonous gas, and any target within it must make a CON saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 1d8 poison damage.

name: Concoction of Fire
desc: Now deals 2d6 fire damage.

name: Concoction of Acid
desc: Now deals 3d6 acid damage

name: Concoction of Fire
desc: Now deals 3d6 fire damage

name: Concoction of Acid
desc: Now deals 4d6 acid damage

name: Concoction of Healing
desc: Now heals 4d8 HP

name: Formulaic Focus
desc: When using a Concoction that requires you to roll damage or healing, you may add your INT modifier to the roll.

name: Concoction of Smoke
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Smoke and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The area of impact is filled with a 10ft radius of smoke that blocks vision. The smoke persists for 1 minute before disappearing. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Concoction of Stunning Powder
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Stunning Powder and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The area of impact if filled with a 10ft radius of concussive energy, and any target within it must make a CON saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target is stunned until your next turn. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Concoction of Fire
desc: Now deals 4d6 fire damage.

name: Concoction of Acid
desc: Now deals 5d6 acid damage

name: Concoction of Healing
desc: Now heals 5d8 HP

name: Concoction of Speed
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Speed. A creature may drink the concoction to increase their movement speed by 20ft for 1 minute.

name: Concoction of Entanglement
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Entanglement and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The area of impact is filled with a 10ft radius of tar that becomes difficult terrain halves the movement speed of any creature within it. The tar persists for 1 minute before disappearing.

name: Concoction of Fire
desc: Now deals 5d6 fire damage.

name: Concoction of Acid
desc: Now deals 8d6 acid damage.

name: Concoction of Healing
desc: Now heals 7d8 HP.

name: Concoction of Thunder
desc: As an action, you can reach into your alchemist’s satchel to pull out a Concoction of Thunder and hurl it at a target within 30ft of you. The area of impact if filled with a 10ft radius of concussive energy, and any target within it must make a CON saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10ft from the point of impact.

name: Concoction of Fire
desc: Now deals 7d6 fire damage.

name: Concoction of Acid
desc: Now deals 10d6 acid damage.

name: Concoction of Healing
desc: Now heals 10d8 HP.

name: Perfected Formula
desc: When you use a Concoction, you may have it deal its maximum damage or heal its maximum HP instead of rolling. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Boomstick
desc: You forge a deadly firearm called a boomstick, a ferocious weapon that fires leaden bullets which can punch through armor with ease. The boomstick is a two-handed ranged weapon with a range of 150ft that deals 2d6 magical piercing damage. Once fired, it must be reloaded as a bonus action. If you lose your boomstick, you may construct a new one over the course of three days.

name: Thunderous Shot
desc: Your boomstick deals an additional 1d6 thunder damage on a hit.

name: Scope Modification
desc: Your range is increased by 100ft. You may only have one Modification active at a time.

name: Magazine Modification
desc: You may hold up to two rounds, allowing you to attack twice before needing to reload as a bonus action. You may only have one Modification active at a time.

name: Thunderous Shot
desc: Now deals 2d6 thunder damage.

name: Force Blast
desc: As an action, instead of making an attack roll you may unleash a blast of energy in a 20ft cone in front of you. Any target within it must make a STR saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 2d6 force damage and is knocked back 10ft.

name: Thunderous Shot
desc: Now deals 4d6 thunder damage.

name: Additional Modification 1
desc: You may choose an additional Modification (you may have multiple of the same Modification active at the same time. These Modifications stack).

name: Piercing Round
desc: As an action, instead of making an attack roll you may unleash a piercing bolt of lightning in a 30ft straight line. Any target within it must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 4d6 electric damage.

name: Thunderous Shot
desc: Now deals 7d6 thunder damage.

name: Force Blast
desc: Now deals 3d6 force damage.

name: Additional Modification 2
desc: You may choose an additional Modification (you may have multiple of the same Modification active at the same time. These Modifications stack).

name: Explosive Round
desc: As an action, instead of making an attack roll you may unleash an explosive shot at a point within your range with a 30ft radius. Any target within it must make DEX saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 4d6 fire damage.

name: Thunderous Shot
desc: Now deals 10d6 thunder damage.

name: Force Blast
desc: Now deals 4d6 force damage.

name: Piercing Round
desc: Now deals 6d6 electric damage.

name: Additional Modification 3
desc: You may choose an additional Modification (you may have multiple of the same Modification active at the same time. These Modifications stack).

name: Mechanical Servant
desc: You craft a mechanical servant which obeys your commands and serves you loyally. Your servant is a Construct with a STR, DEX, CON and WIS score of 10 and a INT and CHA score of 0 as well as AC10 and a base movement speed of 30ft per round. It has a base HP of 10, with a hit die of 1d10 (or 8) + its CON modifier. It is immune to psychic and poison damage, as well as exhaustion, charmed and poisoned conditions. It has a base damage of 1d4 with its fists and can be given a weapon to wield. Your servant understands your commands, but cannot think for itself. Your servant levels with you. If your servant’s HP reaches 0, it can be healed or revived through normal means or you may construct a new one over the course of one day.

name: Construct Upgrade
desc: Your servant may have up to three Upgrades activated at a time.

name: Arcane Link
desc: As an action, you may see and hear through your servant’s sensors while it is within 100ft of you. You are blind and deaf in regards to your own senses while this is active.

name: Arcane Sensors
desc: Your servant has proficiency in the Perception skill. In addition, your servant has advantage on Perception checks.

name: Combat-Ready
desc: Choose two simple weapons. Your servant is considered proficient with the chosen weapons. In addition, your servant has proficiency with all saving throws.

name: Defensive Array
desc: Your servant gains AC1. You may select this Upgrade multiple times.

name: High Tension Springs
desc: Your servant’s base movement speed is increased by 10ft per round.

name: Improved Repertoire
desc: Your servant gains proficiency in a skill of your choice. You may select this Upgrade multiple times.

name: Reserve Power
desc: You may expend a spell slot to heal your servant by 1d8 x the LVL of the spell slot expended HP.

name: Strengthened Chassis
desc: Your servant’s base HP is increased to 12 and gains a hit die of 1d12 (or 10) + its CON modifier.

name: Improved Upgrade
desc: Your servant may have up to five Upgrades activated at a time.

name: Combat Mastery
desc: Choose two martial weapons. Your servant is considered proficient with the chosen weapons. In addition, your servant has proficiency with all saving throws.

name: Extra Attack
desc: Your servant may attack up to two times whenever it takes an attack action on its turn.

name: Relentless
desc: If your servant’s HP would be reduced to 0, instead it is reduced to 1. After it uses this trait, it can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Runic Knowledge
desc: Your servant learns one cantrip of your choice. WIS is the spellcasting modifier for this. You may select this Upgrade multiple times.

name: Spark of Consciousness
desc: Your servant gains an INT score of 6, allowing it to utilize items from your Infuse Magic feature. In addition, your servant is able to speak Common.

name: Upgraded Systems
desc: Choose one ability score from STR, DEX, CON or WIS to increase to 16. If the chosen ability score is already 16 or higher, instead increase it by 2. You may select this Upgrade multiple times.

name: Advanced Upgrade
desc: Your servant may have up to seven Upgrades activated at a time.

name: Cloaking Shield
desc: As an action, your servant may become invisible for up to 1 hour or until your servant attacks or casts a spell. After it uses this trait, it can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Overheat
desc: As an action, instead of making an attack roll your servant may unleash a blast of heat in a 30ft straight line. Any target within it must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 8d6 fire damage. After it uses this trait, it can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Overload
desc: As an action, instead of making an attack roll your servant may unleash an electrical discharge in a 20ft radius. Any target within it must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 5d10 electric damage. After it uses this trait, it can’t use it again until after a rest.

name: Upgraded Sensors
desc: Your servant gains Blindsight up to 30ft. In addition, your servant can no longer be surprised.

name: Enhanced Upgrade
desc: Your servant may have up to eight Upgrades activated at a time.

name: Advanced Materials
desc: Your servant has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

name: Hair Trigger Springs
desc: Your servant has advantage on DEX saving throws. In addition, your servant takes half damage on a failed DEX saving throw and no damage on a success.

name: Magical Ward
desc: Your servant has advantage on saving throws against spells.

name: Ultimate Upgrade
desc: Your servant may have up to nine Upgrades activated at a time.

name: Arcane Shielding
desc: As a bonus action, your servant may activate a bubble of arcane energy for 1 minute. Your servant has resistance to all damage types while this is active. After it uses this trait, it can’t use it again until after combat.

name: Spark of Intellect
desc: Your servant gains an INT score of 16. You may choose up to two LVL1 artificer spells and one LVL2 artificer spell. Your servant is able to cast each of these up to one time until after a rest. In addition, you may choose an additional language for your servant to speak. (This trait requires the Spark of Consciousness trait to be active).

name: Magical Item Analysis
desc: You know the artificer spells Detect Magic and Identify. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Tool Expertise
desc: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses any of the tool proficiencies you gain from this class.

name: Wondrous Invention
desc: Your expertise as an artificer allows you to craft wondrous items.

name: Infuse Magic
desc: You may channel an artificer spell into an object for later use. Doing so expends a spell slot as if you cast the spell, but the effects do not occur. As an action, any creature with an INT score of 6 or higher can use the object to cast the stored spell. The stored spell lasts for up to 8 hours before fading. You may only have a limited number of infused objects equal to your INT modifier. INT is your spellcasting ability for this.

name: Superior Attunement
desc: You may attune up to four magical items. At 15th LVL, you may attune up to five magical items.

name: Soul of Artifice
desc: You may now attune up to six magical items. In addition, you gain a bonus to all saving throws equal to the number of magical items you currently have attuned.

name: Artificer Specialization
desc: Choose a specialization to follow: Alchemist, Gunsmith or Mechanist. You gain additional features depending on which Artificer Specialization you choose.
